item.description:
Currently, Airline 81 is severely underperforming. All players will participate in the game as the new management of Airline 81 Airlines, and must strive to normalize airline performance. Management expects that the new aircraft A81 introduced to normalize its performance will play a role as a game changer.

The goal of the game is to operate the A81 aircraft in an efficient manner, producing high performance.

The game board and auxiliary game board are placed in the center, and the player takes a personal board with the same color as his cube according to the number of players. The game starts with a first player and runs several rounds clockwise.

In player turn, each player proceeds in the order of the next three steps.
1. [Rolling the dice]
The player rolls three dice at the same time in his turn and distinguishes the top color of each dice. Designate A for the same color on the top of each die and B and C for the different colors. 
(Example: Yellow+yellow+red = A+A+B / Blue+Purple+Red = A+B+C / Blue+Blue+Blue= A+A+A)
2. [Choose 1 out of 2 tasks]
The player chooses one of the two tasks(flight Service, staff training) in his turn and behavior once.
 - Task 1: Flight Service
 - Task 2: Staff Training
3. [Moving score markers based on behavior]
Move the score marker according to the player's behavior immediately.

The next player will also continue in the same way in the three-step order, and the round will end when all players play once. As several rounds progress, if the cube is no longer available after one's turn(if there is no A81 reservation), the game ends after only the corresponding round.

At the end of the game, the A81 aircraft management performance(passenger fare score, employee training score, reservation waiting score, checked baggage import performance, profitability improvement performance, marketing performance) is all calculated and the player with the highest total wins.
If the total is tied, the player with more colored cubes in the business class wins. If it is still a tie, more players will win the cube(reserved waiting) remaining on the individual board, and if it is still a tie, they will win jointly.
